title: [K-12] Instructional Design Learning Theory Evaluation Project

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design theory and understanding of science education tools
context.additional_context: Emphasizing the application of theory through smartphone-based resource utilization and creative practice.

learning_goals: Learning theories can be systematically applied to the evaluation of practical science education tools
By comparatively analyzing various instructional design theories, learners can propose improvement plans for educational products
Learners can complete effective theory-based assessment projects even in limited technological environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
